caseTitle: Dr. Zahid Javed v. Dr. Tahir Riaz Chaudhry & others
tagline: The Chancellor while exercising revisional powers under Section 11-A of the University of the Punjab Act 1973 is not required to seek advice of the Chief Minister, therefore, on this legal point, view rendered in the cases of University of Punjab v. Sardar Ali (1992 SCMR 1093) and Federation of Pakistan v. Muhammad Tariq Pirzada (1999 SCMR 2189) is approved whereas the contrary view rendered in the case of Rana Aamer Raza Ashfaq v. Dr. Minhaj Ahmad Khan (2012 SCMR 6) is not approved.
